mods.note: This is a portion of an independent newspaper called the Cosmopolitan Sun, dedicated to civil and social reform. It was published in Van-Leer, Tennessee. This particular edition is distributed world-wide. It includes editorials, astrology, advertisements, and public service announcements. Included within the "In our mailbox" section is an angry letter from the KKK. On Page 8 there is a handwritten note that reads, "Mr. Ishmael gave me this. He printed for the man."
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
